title: Are autonomous more costly when compared to VTU colleges?
content:
I've read many people say that VTU affiliated colleges are bad and one should go for autonomous colleges if possible.

But I want to know if autonomous colleges are more costly than VTU colleges. I read a review about a autonomous college where they stated that that college was asking for money at every chance they got. Does this apply to majority of the autonomous colleges?

I'm looking to go for a engineering college through KCET and I'm from a lower middle class family. So I don't want to join a college that's going to increase my expenses unnecessarily.

comments.body:
Usually , yes , but it depends.
But I'd say paying 30k-40k extra would be worth it in the long run if the college had better crowd and peer group.
Yup. If a college has a better crowd then I'm more than happy to pay the extra amount. College crowd and the environment matters more than people think it does.
